product_name: Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit - Single
long_description: The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit transforms your AdvancedFrame Convertible kayak into a closed deck solo touring kayak . Deck is made from durable high-density polyester for lasting resistance to the elements; welded seams and durable PVC coating offer waterproof protection. 2 stiffening bars, fore and aft of cockpit, keep deck rigid and prevent water from pooling. D-rings and bungee deck lacing offer an easy place to tie down gear. Rear cargo hatch provides access below the deck. Heavy-duty coil zipper with metal slider provides easy installation while kayak is deflated. Inflatable coaming with 2 twist-open air valves creates a rigid attachment for a spray skirt (sold separately). The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit folds down easily into included mesh storage bag with drawcord closure.
short_description: The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit transforms your AdvancedFrame Convertible kayak into a closed deck solo touring kayak .
